title: Cofactr opens Long Beach warehouse, creating new option for drone industry logistics on the West coast

text:
As the drone industry faces mounting pressure to build domestically and reduce reliance on foreign —especially Chinese — components, a new warehouse facility in Long Beach, California, marks a shift in how critical hardware logistics are managed domestically. Created by Cofactr, which is a source-to-pay and logistics platform that already operates a similar warehouse in […]

The post Cofactr opens Long Beach warehouse, creating new option for drone industry logistics on the West coast appeared first on The Drone Girl.
